website_summaries.verdict: Best choice if you're looking for a modest lift, as the bra is designed with SmartZone cups.
pros: Virtually invisible beneath clothing, especially with convertible straps
Neckline is designed with a lower cut to accommodate low-cut tops and gowns
Extremely comfortable and holds shape well after many washes
cons: Some wearers feel the cups are too thin and lack enough padding

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as in-store purchase
customer_reviews.text: I buy these same bras in the store but this one did not fit the same. I double checked the size twice thinking it has to be wrong. The wire is bent funny and the bottom wants to curve up. The bra cup itself wants to curve out. It’s awful. I’d recommend buying this in the store or at least not here.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Yes, something is wrong with this
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE comfort devotion...but there is not a lot of neutral color choose so I try this too... The strap is really slippery...somehow the material of the entire bra is more sketchy so everything seems not staying in place then expected. I see what other refer to the outer edge seem to be bending forward...so if you have bigger cup, I think you will see that it is more visible under tight clothing. I am returning due to the edge of the cup bending outward.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chan

customer_reviews.title: I like these
customer_reviews.text: I've never tried this bra on at the store, so I don't know how it differs. But the version here online is great for me. I've bought a few different ones - both colors and sizes (thanks to changing sizes due to pregnancy). I like that they're comfortable, they provide good support and protection (don't rub), but the padding isn't thick/push up. I don't see bra lines when I wear them under t-shirts, and they launder just fine.
customer_reviews.author: A Levin

customer_reviews.title: Fit is large compared to in store
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchase this item I actually tried it on in store so I was disappointed when it arrived as it was too large. I was able to hook it on the last hook and the bra fit snug in store but this one I had to hook it on the third hook and it still wasn't as good of a fit. I agree with other reviews that this one is also a very slippery material and it does seem to me that it is a bit different than what I tried on. I did verify that it was the same model as well. Ultimately I am disappointed and returning.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Okay "Basic" Bra
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand for reliable sizing, good material, and fit/coverage. This particular bra was just okay. I was looking for something a little more full coverage and with more substantial straps. I was pleased with the color as a "nude" bra (I'm pretty pale and this would have worked under semi-sheet white tees). I ended up returning it because I was looking for a more substantial, full-coverage bra. Otherwise, I do think this is a good basic t-shirt bra for the price!
customer_reviews.author: BMG Boston, MA

customer_reviews.title: Great T-shirt bra!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bra! It's 38b and it fits as expected. Really comfortable! I only wish the padding was thicker. It's definitely a t shirt bra. I love it tho! You can change the straps if your wearing a tank top. You can't make it strapless tho. Great everyday bra! 145lbs 5'3 36c or 38b for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Laci

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday bra
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite Maidenform bras. It does everything I need and want it to do. It is super comfortable, gives great lift and the straps can be worn normal or crossed across the back. I own this bra in three colors and wear them daily (I even own two of the nude so I can have one when I wash the other one). These bras run for $30 to $40 each and at less than $20 on amazon this was a great deal for an everyday bra.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Wear it often. Straps are kind of slippery and fall down occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time purchasing this bra, and the quality on the second is no where close to the first. In fact- I’ve worn it once and it’s already starting to show damage on the strap. This is not acceptable. The only difference between the original and the new one is that it’s a large cup size- no reason for the complete change in straps or bands.
customer_reviews.author: ShrinkingSmith82

customer_reviews.title: has a ripple
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness of the bra and own this bra in two other colors - but the bra I got has a crease in the cup. It seems like they put the wrong size cup in the bra and sewed it up. I can't wear tight shirts with it because it looks funny and you can see the crease. I washed it and tried to iron it out, but it won't come out because that cup inside the bra is too big causing a ripple.
customer_reviews.author: bizk11

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and well fitting
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort and fit of these bras and the color choices are nice. I do struggle with keeping the straps from falling off constantly and the straps also easily fall out of the hooks that allow for them to be worn in the x position. I actually sewed the straps on in the back a little closer together and fixed the falling off issue. The problem with that is they can no longer be adjust for wearing in the crossed back position. Not sure I'd purchase again, however, well fitting comfortable bras that aren't like wearing a straight jacket are hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma eeed

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite bra.
customer_reviews.text: After having my son and breast feeding, the girls don't quite sit where they used to. My back got wider as well. I've had trouble finding a comfortable bra that fits after giving birth... it has been 9 years... finally, I've found one that is comfortable, doesn't leave the side boob roll, or push up falling out over the top, wire digging feeling. I feel like I could sleep in it. The padding is just right and put the itty bitties where they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Telgip

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t wash well
customer_reviews.text: This looked fine when I bought it and is comfortable, but after one wash the foam rolled out on the top edge giving it lines that show under clothes. It’s not wearable anymore.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Got a 36a from another company and it fits perfectly. This one, I had to put it on the last clasps and it's still too tight. The cups are also too close together so they don't cover the parts closer to my armpits. I feel like I have a uniboob in the middle of my chest. I was really hoping to like it based on the reviews and price. I don't know if going up a size or to a sister size will make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Centaurette

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BRA!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra! I dread buying bras - none of them are comfortable ( well - not at this price point!) I refuse to spend a fortune on bras. This bra is excellent quality- very comfortable and a great price. Will be purchasing another. The size is exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit on me
customer_reviews.text: This style is not a good fit on me even though I usually have great experiences with Maidenform. It was stretching in certain areas while being baggy in others. The front cross while looking nice - did nothing positive for my bust area. Bra fits are very personal. So my issues may not apply to you; however, be aware that this version is not your typical Maidenform fit.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel No. 5

customer_reviews.title: Great bra, but buy it elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have mentioned, this doesn’t seem quite the same as the ones I bought in a store. The lining fabric is not as silky as the two I bought elsewhere, and it seems a bit larger. Also, while this isn’t about the product itself, the bra arrived with creases in the cup. It may be due to the packaging (an envelope, not a box), or it could be that the bra was creased before shipping. I should have returned it, but I ripped off the labels and I figure it’s too late. I will cautiously attempt to iron the cups. Great bra, but don’t buy it here.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Who thought underwires could be comfortable?
customer_reviews.text: I am a small breasted women who always hated underwires, but this bra is the exception. Great comfort and looks. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lavelle

customer_reviews.title: Soft support
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable bras I own, I even wear it underneath my strapless to help keep it up and give me more cleavage. You can cross the straps for a more secure busty feeling or not and it feels like an extension of your skin. Fabric is super soft and silky smooth and it stays cool if I'm hot.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Creases and dents in padding
customer_reviews.text: This bra fit just like the ones at the store, beautifully, but it had creases and dents in the padding that showed under shirts. I let it set for several days, hoping the padding would regain it's shape, but it did not change. I did not try washing it, because I was afraid I wouldn't be able to return it if I did, but maybe that would have fixed the problem. I'm returning the bra.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: delighted
customer_reviews.text: this was my first underwire bra purchase online. i have historically struggled with underwire bras. they look so beautiful, but they have only caused me discomfort. i chose this bra in a 40 C. I usually wear a 38 C. this bra is so comfortable, light, gives a beautiful silhouette, the color is vibrant (i chose the navy, and it was richer than i expected) and the fabric is silky. the fit is great, and i will opt for a 40 C from now on. I ordered this again in Lavender, and am excited for it to arrive!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Happy mistake??
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in a 32dd and ended up with a strapless bra in 34d. The outer packaging was labeled 32dd but the bra I actually received was not at all what I ordered. Probably just a mistake. I tried it on and it ended up fitting perfectly and I kinda do need a strapless bra so I’m gonna keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Makes the girls look flat
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how certain bras can make a C cup look flat---but this is one of those bras. Makes the girls look flat and shapeless. I like maidenform, but not this cut. So if you are looking for a minimizer look--I guess this is for you--but I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: THISSY

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit
customer_reviews.text: The color and material is nice. The fit is terrible. It causes "the girls" to look is if they are pointing out to the sides in opposite directions.
customer_reviews.author: Famof4

customer_reviews.title: Could be nice with better strap connection
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this bra, cups fit well, but the back straps where they meet the back band scratched and left red marks by the end of the day. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Chapman-Schneringer

customer_reviews.title: My very favorite
customer_reviews.text: My go to every day bra. Once I tried this particular style, I had to order a couple more. It can be worn 12-14 hours and most the time you hardly can tell that you’re wearing a bra. Comfortable with just a small bit of padding. Good support in just the right places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could get colors other than black, but that's what I get for wearing the same size as lots of other ladies.This is my second time ordering this bra as the price is right for Maidenform quality. Will certainly order more if other color choices become available.
customer_reviews.author: Tinman5

customer_reviews.title: Not the best fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit in terms of the band size is fine. The problem is that the cup doesn’t doesn’t adhere to the breast. Underneath tops and blouses you can see the edge formation through the blouse. Not so great for tight tops but may be okay for looser fitting blouses.
customer_reviews.author: Mieux Mieux

customer_reviews.title: The smoothest fabric
customer_reviews.text: This bra is so smooth inside and out. Very comfortable, with just enough padding to prevent peek-a-boos. I bought my first of these at a Hanes/Bali outlet, and even on sale, Amazon's prices are way better. I now own 5 of these bras!
customer_reviews.author: Bitty

customer_reviews.title: Cups run big
customer_reviews.text: The band size on this bra is perfect. However the cups are bigger than I thought they'd be based on the picture. I'm a bit uneven, so one cup is quite a bit to big on me, and the other is just barely a fit. Under the right clothing though this should be OK.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Steiner

customer_reviews.title: almost right
customer_reviews.text: Fabric, construction, and fit were all great. There is a small stretch of fabric underneath the underwire and after a while it rolled up. I had to retire it early.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: The Just Right Bra
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bra. It’s comfortable and fits perfect!! The underwire doesn’t poke me in the side!! I love the fact that it does not have a lot of padding. It’s not a full coverage bra, a plus. It’s a just the right size, right color, right everything bra!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bekka

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about it is that the padded area gets wrinkled easily that it leaves and indentation or bump on it that you can see it through your shirt. However, it was very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Bra
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed by this bra. The padding is thin, which wouldn't be a problem except that it ripples in a weird way instead of being smooth. Also the top edges curl out, which makes it useless as a t-shirt bra. I've been a big fan of Maidenform bras, but this one is an almost complete failure.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This bra has comfortable wide straps that don't dig in. The cups have enough lining for a smooth look, but are thin enough to transmit sensation. There's even a hint of crossover styling between the cups. Nonetheless, this bra is built for comfort not sex-appeal. I have tried several bras in the last two years and this is by far my favorite. (I am a 36B so I cannot speak to its support for larger sizes.)
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Mork

customer_reviews.title: Fits well but there are problems
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bra. At first I was sent the wrong size so I had to return that and get a new one. The correct size came and I love the bra, but to my disappointment it came with the bra cups starting to curl. I don't think this bra will last many wears as the curling is going to get worse. Other than that it is comfortable and soft. Every single Maidenform Bra I have bought off Amazon has come curled, thus, I am thinking these are the defective bras.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like how comfortable this bra is compared to any other bras I’ve had, but the straps are too wide. It doesn’t affect the fit but the look isn’t appealing to me, especially when wearing tank tops
customer_reviews.author: LadyStrangler

customer_reviews.title: True to size and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bra! I'm a 34A and the bra is true to size! Its definitely not an overly padded bra, but that's not what I wanted. Completely as expected and would buy again, I'm wearing it now!
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Jillian Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Nice bra
customer_reviews.text: I just have a hard time finding my fit. I’m small in statute and a bit large on top. I have to adjust the straps with safety pins all the time. It’s a great bra but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine Britt

customer_reviews.title: Not the bra for me.
customer_reviews.text: The fit of the bra was fine overall but there was little to no padding. I needed more (5’4”, 36A) so I ended up returning this bra. Perhaps if you’re looking for a very simple bra with little support or shape, you would like this bra
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Supportive
customer_reviews.text: Need a smooth bra that converted to a racer back when necessary. This one did both perfectly. The cups are seamless and very supportive, easily converts to a racer back without losing any of the support.
customer_reviews.author: nolagirl

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty and Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I know this style was the least expensive out of the selection but I love it! Very feminine even for an old 53 yr old like me! Oh, and VERY comfortable - no strap fiddling or ride up 😊
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Drew

customer_reviews.title: Size 40 Demi Bra!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only size 40 Demi bra I’ve been able to find. I was wearing a 38C. The first one I ordered was a 40C but it was too large. The 40B fit perfectly. I should have read the copy that explained this.
customer_reviews.author: LBrady

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable - The one I received is great
customer_reviews.text: I saw some complaints, but the one I received is great. It is very comfortable, a touch on the large size for the size. I have ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Made cheap
customer_reviews.text: Fit on the smaller size. Wasn’t impressed at all. Itchy and made cheap. All these name brand bras are not made like they used to be. Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: PrettynPinkboots

customer_reviews.title: Cup size not as expected
customer_reviews.text: This bra's cup size runs too big. This was not even close to fitting properly. The fabric was soft and likely would have been comfortable had it fit correctly. I had to return it due to being too large.
customer_reviews.author: Kim N.

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and fits good
customer_reviews.text: Very good material and fits perfectly. 4/5 starts because material didn't look as good as on the picture, however not big of the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Queeno

customer_reviews.title: Fit is ok.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on an older bra of the same company and style I posses which I had bought in T.J Maxx or some of the similar store. But this doesn't seem to be the same kind I have.
customer_reviews.author: avlak18

customer_reviews.title: Nice but for me so big !!
customer_reviews.text: This is to large to me , I bought same size I use do buy in Victoria Secret but maybe is different model ! Anyway I will order another one 1 cup less! Let’s see!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Sabino

customer_reviews.title: Nice bra but the edges aren't flat
customer_reviews.text: I like these bras for fit and comfort but I find that the front edges tend to curl outwards so you get a line showing through your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel LY

customer_reviews.title: Chlorine smell
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing just to share that unfortunately the bra I received has a chlorine smell to it that I cannot get to go away. Unfortunately it means that I cannot wear it as every time I've tried I eventually become overwhelmed with the smell being just under my nose at all times
customer_reviews.author: April Manchezzi

customer_reviews.title: I threw it out
customer_reviews.text: Fits ok, but doesn’t stay in place, fabric is very slippery.. I’ve never had a bra so uncomfortable due to constant adjusting
customer_reviews.author: Tara Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and comfortable. Maybe the most comfortable bra I have every bought. I don’t like full coverage bras and this one provides just the right coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. No dents, no ripples. It feels like true Maidenform material (I’ve purchased several Maidenform bras/shapewear in store in the past). This is probably my favorite every day bra so far!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I do not usually write reviews, but this bra is worth it, very comfortable, you do not feel it, but does it's job, hold everything in place and color is perfect. Very stretchy, but stable. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Anna H.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable bra!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a comfortable bra! I actually prefer this over a sports bra now because it’s so soft. Love this bra!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Fits exactly like the one I purchased at a dept. store!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect and the bra color looks just like the picture on my computer. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: pvlimbaugh

customer_reviews.title: BEST bra evaaaaaa!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a hunt for a decent bra and have tons that all have 1 or 2 things I don't like about them EXCEPT for this style! I have purchased 2 and will keep buying them til I have a stock so I never have to be uncomfortable again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Best bra ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is my all-time favorite bra. It's cute, supportive, comfortable, and time underwire never digs into me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this bra fits! There are no gaps or bulges at all. I highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, cute but, colors are not at all as advertised. I ordered tropical which shows as burgandy, olive and i got pink really bright pink, flowers with green.
customer_reviews.author: Terri DeHoyos

customer_reviews.title: Band not Snug
customer_reviews.text: I am a true 34C. The band on this bra does not fit snug enough & lifts in the front under the cups. I tried on the 3 different hook settings. Hard to find bras in a nice neutral color, thinner straps, and with the band covered for side and back smoothness.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Really good fit. The fabric is nice and soft. I like that the padding is thin but with great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Great bra
customer_reviews.text: Great bra for the price. I bought it in navy, fits very well. I love the quality, the material washes up nice. I may buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: New Mama Review
customer_reviews.text: I’m 10 months postpartum and am used to shopping for cute “teen” style bras with zero lift, but I need more now! So I opted for these in both tan and black. They’re cozy, have NO PADDING AT ALL, wash up great when you hang to dry, & fit like a glove. Even push my girls together for extra cleavage! 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Nix Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and design
customer_reviews.text: The bra fit perfectly and the quality and design were above expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a pretty bra. Fits perfectly. It’s comfortable. Material is soft.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Wood

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend!!! The top edges curl in making it a terrible bra to wear with a t-shirt. This brand and style was my favorite bra and I never had this problem before but apparently it happens to a lot of people on here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfty
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday, i have 3 and i should buy it again. So comfty. fit as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Maria E Matos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought many colors . Very comfertable, bets one for me .
customer_reviews.author: SEMA TOPKARA

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit
customer_reviews.text: The cups separate your breasts a lot and it is not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Suter

customer_reviews.title: Love this bra
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and comfortable. This is the only brand that fits me right.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: scratchy
customer_reviews.text: The front is soft however the inside of the straps are scratchy
customer_reviews.author: Tangee Craig

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage, thin lining, not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my normal size, and the cups were too big. The material is very nice, soft and silky. The cups also have more coverage than I was expecting, I would consider a full coverage. The lining is rather thin, and does not prevent nipple show thru.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap bras, wire came out first time using it . As soon as you was they lose shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top large
customer_reviews.text: This was way way too big. Bubbled at the top of the cup.
customer_reviews.author: aboveparr

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and the top of the cup kept folding over
customer_reviews.author: Helen Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Great bra!  Comfy too!
customer_reviews.text: This particular bra is a keeper. Good product and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bra...
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra. Fits perfect and is really comfy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Harden

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Bigger cups that have permanent wrinkles from shipping, does not look like the picture, awful underwire that is painful, elastic over underwire rubs your skin off. Shipping took 3x longer than promised. (38D was the size I purchased)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Bra Love!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is fantastic! Fits perfectly and is exactly as described and shown. Sooo comfortable and gorgeous. Looks and FEELS amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amatista LaRoca

customer_reviews.title: My best bra
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra fits so well and there is nothing pinching or poking! Very comfortable! So happy I purchased it
customer_reviews.author: julie mapes

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery. I had ordered a navy one in the past & it was comfortable & wore well so I ordered more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Bra review - fiancé purchased
customer_reviews.text: my fiancé said this is the best bra she’s ever worn. (She purchased this and her sizes are a 36d 132lbs 5’0)
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable bra but huge cup
customer_reviews.text: Cups are huge! I am a 38B and the band and materials are excellent and comfortables but the cup is like a C , not a B. So it doesn’t look sexy.
customer_reviews.author: Norms R

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Bandwidth fits well and soft but cups don't support or shape like says. Cups lightly lined.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hasbrouck

customer_reviews.title: very pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: this bra looks really nice and feels just as nice. I plan to buy it in more colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: What I ordered is not what was sent. I'd like this style to wear under t shirts. The one I received won't work for that with lace trim on the cups.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Heaton

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: Bras can be very expensive. this one is made well and is a good price. I have It in every color.
customer_reviews.author: JENN

customer_reviews.title: My sister love it
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my sister, fit perfect, im going to buy her now the beige one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bra ever! Tell your friends
customer_reviews.text: Best bra I have ever worn in my life!! Just brought two more. Feels amazing and fits perfectly....you know when you get home from a long day and the first thing you want to do is take the bra off....well it might be the second thing.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R. Jeske

customer_reviews.title: Good basic bra
customer_reviews.text: It’s a basic every day bra. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: CB CA

customer_reviews.title: Glad I took a chance.
customer_reviews.text: Fits exactly as it did in the store. I was worried because of the reviews but it fits perfectly. The price on here for both was less than one at Kohls! Worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: CKK

customer_reviews.title: The only bra I’ll buy!
customer_reviews.text: This fit is so perfect! This is the most perfect bra!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Product seems like it is well made. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymie

customer_reviews.title: Great basic bra for the busy and smart practicsl woman
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect color , great fit , soft and easy!!
customer_reviews.author: NGK

customer_reviews.title: Great Demi Bra
customer_reviews.text: Great demi bra, comfortable, fit was good, style was good, got the navy blue which was a true navy color.
customer_reviews.author: Debe Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about purchasing a bra on amazon... but I love this bra. Soft material. I wear a size 32DD.
customer_reviews.author: Akyah Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and flattering
customer_reviews.text: Bras are personal and what fits for some doesn’t fit for others, but personally I live how this fits and make my form look.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C

customer_reviews.title: cup size
customer_reviews.text: it is bigger than expected, I got my normal size but the cup is cut higher than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

product_meta.title: Maidenform Women's One Fabulous Fit 2.0 Tailored Demi Bra Bra
product_meta.description: Upgrade your t-shirt bra collection with the Maidenform one fabulous fitted 2.0 tailored demi bra! featuring a modern cup shape that provides the perfect amount of coverage, while the smartzone cups give support right where you need it most. The satin-soft fabric keeps you comfortable 24/7, and it is a no show under tees.
feature_bullets: Smart-zone cups for uplift shaping and support
Comfortable all day and it is a no show under your favorite tees
Features a modern cup shape for the perfect amount of coverage
